tool.name: Insert compounds

param.name: iid
param.label: unique name for the molecule database
param.help: Please keep in mind, that any existing database with that name will be replaces.

param.name: processes
param.label: How many processes should be used?
param.help: Please specify how many processes should be used.

param.name: description
param.label: Database description.
param.help: That text will appear in select boxes in the database tools.

tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**Note**. Storing large amounts of molecules in a database can be a time-consuming process. **Note**. Existing databases with the same name gets replaced, without any further notice!
-----
**What it does**
That tool will build a molecule storage with the provided molecules in SMILES format.
